sections.description: This is the pages chapter. The pages are concrete examples of what the templates will look like when they are used with real content. This where you'll create all the problematic scenarious that tend to break the application. Examples of problematic content might include really dark or really light images, really long or really short texts and perhaps some problematic localized content as well.

Biography page displays stories of some developers who participated in the project.

Exercise 5.1a: Update the markup to match the changes done to the People Listing Page Template in Exercise 4.1a.

Exercise 5.1b: Update the application ( src/index.html ) markup to match the changes done to the People Listing Page Template in Exercise 4.1a.
sections.markup:
Biographies

Below are stories of the different people involved in the development of the project.

Alice Smith
Alice Smith is a web developer with ten years of experience in modern web technologies. She used to write HTML5 before it was cool and is famous for her ability to write javacsript code using nothing but a soldering iron and two paper clips.
Bob Johnsson
Bob Johnsson is a designer with a nice haircut and lots of experience in user experience and service design.

sections.description:
Contact person page lists people who can be contacted in different matters.

Exercise 5.2a: Update the markup to match the changes done to the People Listing Page Template in Exercise 4.1a.
sections.markup:
Contact Persons

Below are people who should be contacted in different matters.

Clara Williams
Clara Williams is the CEO of Software Company limited and should be contacted in case of important matters.
Daniel Brown
Daniel Brown is the sales manager of the Software Company and should be contacted with business requests.
